response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $950,000 for this transaction. We understand its value to you is $800,000, but we hope this offer presents a fair compromise that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
